text: Erik Durm (born 12 May 1992 in Pirmasens) is a German association football defender (football) that plays for Borussia Dortmund and the Germany national football team. He was part of Germany's 2014 FIFA World Cup squad. He made his first appearance for Germany in their draw against Cameroon on 1 June 2014. == Other websites == * fussballdaten.de Category:1992 births Category:Living people Category:2014 FIFA World Cup players Category:German footballers Category:Sportspeople from Rhineland-Palatinate
title: Erik Durm
